item.description:
Celebrate Valentines This year in style at the acclaimed ladder district restaurant, MANTRA. Featuring A Five course prix fixe dinner created by Mantra's Talented Culinary Team, with creations blending the French and Indian Cuisine.

Deemed Bostons 3 million dollar room, Mantra is covered from floor to ceiling in 18th century imported Italian marble. The fully renovated Old Colony Bank features laser cut mirrors, a 40ft marble bar (former tellers cage), a waterfall, saffron silk drapery, a walk in safe (the OM lounge,) and a handmade woven wood private den. "...one of the most significant interior spaces in Boston in a decade" - The Boston Globe


Lets go as couples or friends for a great night on the town!


check out the menu and information @ Mantraboston.eventbrite.com


PLEASE PURCHASE AND MAKE RESERVATIONS RSVP@ONEWORLDCUISINE.COM OR 617-661-6300
item.name: Special Valentines Dinner AT MANTRA
